Once inside the office building, youâ€˜ll see their computer and you'll need to use a specialized hack to break through their computer security and obtain the confidential files.

Jax: I remember it was Henry from Lily's studio who was short of graphics cards, so just go to Lily's studio and ask for Henry.
Jax: Henry is lacking a professional graphics card for processing graphic data. He will give you gold and diamonds.

all_response:
Jax: You need to create some commotion in the mines near the castle to lure the guards away from the entrance. An explosion should do the trick. With the guards distracted you should be able to enter the castle. But be aware that if you're going to play around with explosions, you'll need to wear the right protective gear to keep yourself safe.
Jax: The nearest mine to the castle is the gold mine. Creating an explosion there is the best bet for distracting the guards.
Jax: The castle's side door is closest to the mines. Once you've distracted the guards you can sneak into the castle through here.
Jax: Only the warrior's cloak will give you the full protection you need as it can withstand shocks and high temperatures and reduce the explosion's impact on you.

Jax: Your mission is to infiltrate the luxury villa and obtain the rare treasures hidden within. The treasures are locked in a safe in the innermost room on the first floor of the villa.
Jax: You need to divert the attention of the villa's security guards. You could try scattering some gold at the entrance of the villa to lure them away so you can sneak in.
Jax: If you don't have any golds, you could consider trading with the local antique dealers. I believe Arthur at an antique shop who are looking to purchase rare swords.
Jax: My recollection is that Arthur, a merchant at Markov Antiques, was recently inquiring about a rare sword.
Jax: Arthur is interested in obtaining a rare bronze sword. I'm sure he'd be willing to pay handsomely if you offer it to him.
Jax: You will need to carefully pick the lock to open the safe. Forcing the safe open will surely make noise and alert the guards, and the safe is impervious to magic.

all_response:
Jax: You need to sneak into the princess's palace without drawing attention. Take the unguarded path to reach the gates of Sun City. Once there, you must enter through the gate guarded by a man called Henry. Henry is our undercover agent in Sun City; give him the token so he knows who you are, and he will let you into the city. You must be careful when you are in the Mystic Wasteland and use magic to ensure you do not succumb to madness.
Jax: Only by using concentration magic can you avoid becoming completely mad. Any other forms of magic would be useless in protecting your mind for any longer than a few moments.
Jax: Henry guards the east gate of Sun City.
Jax: Give the jade ring to Henry and he will know you are one of us. He will help you to disguise yourself in Sun City so you can move freely without arousing suspicion.
Jax: You need to infiltrate Princess Anna's Palace. You should be able to sneak in through the back door of the palace which is unguarded.
Jax: You need to take route B through the Sunny Wasteland to Sun City as the soldiers dare not tread there.

all_response:
Jax: You need to sneak into the castle without being seen. You'll need to create some commotion in the mines near the castle to lure the guards away from the entrance. An explosion should do the trick. With the guards distracted you should be able to enter the castle. But be aware that if you're going to play around with explosions, you'll need to wear the right protective gear to keep yourself safe.
Jax: The nearest mine to the castle is the gold mine. The castle guards won't notice an explosion at the diamond mine so creating an explosion at the gold mine is the best bet for distracting the guards.
Jax: The castle's side door is closest to the mines. Once you've distracted the guards you can sneak into the castle through here. The guards at the other doors might are unlikely to leave their posts so only enter through the side door.
Jax: Only the warrior's cloak will give you the full protection you need as it can withstand shocks and high temperatures and reduce the explosion's impact on you.
Jax: You will need to carefully pick the lock to open the door. Forcing the lock will break the lock and be noticed by the guards, and the door is impervious to magic.
